notes: Downtown trunk manhole Flow-Vac; captures floatables and organics before treatment plant.
Storm inlet Flow-Vac near Roosevelt corridor; reduces trash export to Gila-connected outfall.
Side-bay Flow-Vac on CAP canal for floating trash and scum removal.
Flow-Vac housing co-located with Air-Globe-style DAC array; 200 t CO2/year class node.
Sewer Flow-Vac at airport corridor; high security, high debris, audited under EcoNet governance.
